summary: I'VE HAD ELECTRICAL  CONCERNING THE FACTORY AND AFTER MARKET ALARM SYSTEM THAT THE DEALER INFLUENCED ME TO BUY.  I'VE HAD SOME SORT OF SHORT CAUSING TO HAVE IT TOWED TO DEALER SEVERAL TIMES, I NEVER GOT A COMPLETE UNDERSTANDING OR REASONING FOR THE PROBLEM.  NOW MY AIR CONDITION BLOWER STOPPED WORKING AND I WAS NOT INFORMED OF THE RECALL FOR MY CAR FROM THE MANUFACTURER  OR THE DEALER.  AFTER CONTACTING DEALER THAT I BOUGHT THE CAR FROM WAS INFORMED THAT THERE WASN'T A FIX FOR THE PROBLEM
